item.title: Why So Many Inc. 5000 Companies Embrace Flexible Schedules
item.description: Policies that allow employees to work when and where they want are helping these companies outperform the competition.

item.description: The new feature is one of Google’s many Gemini-related updates recently.

item.description: A top commercial real estate company shared their insights.

item.title: A Small-Business Survey Says These 3 Strategies Boost Holiday Revenue and Sales
item.description: A new Constant Contact report reveals how to maximize sales before year’s end.

item.title: How Canva Is Bringing Vibe Coding and Design Features to Entrepreneurs
item.description: The Australian design software maker Canva just rolled out big AI updates. It also launched an inexpensive new plan for solopreneurs and small teams.
